import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-email', templateUrl: './email.component.html', styleUrls: ['./email.component.css'] }) export class EmailComponent implements OnInit { //create object and bind each field with the input field data={ to:"", subject:"", message:"" } constructor(){ } ngOnInit(): void { } doSubmitForm(){ console.log("try to submit form"); console.log("Data",this.data); } }
